trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around September 2nd 2011
Summary: hovered over houses across from my house, first there were 2 floating by, and continued on, there were a few more, i ran got my digital camera, shut the flash and started taking shots of the craft through my 2nd floor window, on came out like a triangle
divs: Sighting Detailshovered over houses across from my house, first there were 2 floating by, and continued on, there were a few more, i ran got my digital camera, shut the flash and started taking shots of the craft through my 2nd floor window, on came out like a triangle shape, three rods with pods at the ends of like a tri-pod, it did not spin, they floated along, bright like on fire, and floated into the distance...i have a few good pictures but not interested in losing my copy right to them by sending them along.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
